title: relation to paragraph 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the purpose of
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Continuing Vocational Training
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Continuing Vocational Training 
Survey) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited statistic (continuing vocational training survey) order 2021

title: relation to paragraph 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the purpose of
heading: 2. (1) In this Order –
text_raw:
2. (1) In this Order – 

“Covid-19” means a disease caused by infection with the virus SARS-CoV-2 
and specified as an infectious disease in accordance with Regulation 6 of, and 
the Schedule to, the Infectious Diseases Regulations 1981 (S.I. No. 390 of 1981) 
or any variant of the disease so specified as an infectious disease in those 
Regulations; 

“Regulation” means Regulation (EC) No. 1552/2005 of the European Parliament 
and of the Council of 7 September 20051 , as amended by Regulation (EC) No. 
1893/2006 and Regulation (EC) No. 596/2009 of the European Parliament and 
of the Council of 18 June 20096; 

“Regulation (EC) No. 1893/2006” means Regulation (EC) No. 1893/2006 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 20 December 20062, as amended by 
Regulation (EC) No. 295/2008 of the European Parliament and of the Council 
of 11 March 20083, Regulation (EU) No. 70/2012 of the European Parliament 
and of the Council of 18 January 20124 and Regulation (EU) 2019/1243 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 20 June 20195; 

“survey” means the Continuing Vocational Training Survey conducted by the 
Central Statistics Office in order to obtain information specified in the Schedule, 
including for the purposes of compliance with the Regulation. 

1 OJ No. L 255, 30.9.2005, p.1 
2 OJ No. L 393, 30.12.2006, p. 1 
3 OJ No. L 97, 9.4.2008, p. 13 
4 OJ No. L 32, 3.2.2012, p. 1 
5 OJ No. L 198, 25.7.2019, p. 241 
6 OJ No. L 188 18.7.2009, p. 14 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 2nd March, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [86] 3 

(2) A word or expression that is used in this Order and also used in the 
Regulation has the same meaning in this Order as in the Regulation, except 
where the context otherwise requires.
text_norm: 2 (1) order - covid-19 mean disease caused infection virus sars-cov-2 specified infectious disease accordance regulation 6 schedule infectious disease regulation 1981 (s.i no 390 1981) variant disease specified infectious disease regulation regulation mean regulation (ec) no 1552 2005 european parliament council 7 september 20051 amended regulation (ec) no 1893 2006 regulation (ec) no 596 2009 european parliament council 18 june 20096 regulation (ec) no 1893 2006 mean regulation (ec) no 1893 2006 european parliament council 20 december 20062 amended regulation (ec) no 295 2008 european parliament council 11 march 20083 regulation (eu) no 70 2012 european parliament council 18 january 20124 regulation (eu) 2019 1243 european parliament council 20 june 20195 survey mean continuing vocational training survey conducted central statistic office order obtain information specified schedule including purpose compliance regulation 1 oj no l 255 30.9.2005 p.1 2 oj no l 393 30.12.2006 p 1 3 oj no l 97 9.4.2008 p 13 4 oj no l 32 3.2.2012 p 1 5 oj no l 198 25.7.2019 p 241 6 oj no l 188 18.7.2009 p 14 notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 2nd march 2021 86 3 (2) word expression used order also used regulation meaning order regulation except context otherwise requires

title: relation to paragraph 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the purpose of
heading: 3. This Order applies to an undertaking that -
text_raw:
3. This Order applies to an undertaking that - 

(a) 

(b) 

employs 10 or more persons, and 

is classified for statistical purposes under section B, C, D, E, F, 
G, H, I, J, K, L, M, N, R or S of NACE Rev. 2, as set out in Annex 
I to Regulation (EC) No. 1893/2006.
text_norm: 3 order applies undertaking - (a) (b) employ 10 person classified statistical purpose section b c e f g h j k l n r nace rev 2 set annex regulation (ec) no 1893 2006

title: relation to paragraph 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the purpose of
heading: 4. A requirement on undertakings to which this Order applies to provide, once
text_raw:
4. A requirement on undertakings to which this Order applies to provide, once 
only and for the purposes of the survey, information, in relation to the year 2020, 
the general nature of which is specified in the Schedule is hereby prescribed. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [86]
text_norm: 4 requirement undertaking order applies provide purpose survey information relation year 2020 general nature specified schedule hereby prescribed 4 86
